title: temp_website
text: Hello! I’m Daryl Lai, a Applied Computing (FinTech) undergraduate with hands-on experience in machine learning, financial data analysis, and software development. Strong foundation in Python, C#, and SQL, with internship experience at the Accounting and Corporate Regulatory Authority (ACRA). Seeking opportunities in data analytics, fintech, or applied AI.

title: Student Intership at ACRA
text:
The organization that I am doing my internship with is Accounting and Corporate Regulatory Authority (ACRA). ACRA is a statutory board under the Ministry of Finance. It is the regulator of business registration, financial reporting, public accountants and corporate service providers. It also plays the role of a facilitator for the development of business entities and the public accountancy profession.
ACRA is responsible for carrying out the following functions:

To administer the Accounting and Corporate Regulatory Authority Act 2004, the Accountants Act 2004, the Business Names Registration Act 2014, the Companies Act 1967, the Limited Liability Partnerships Act 2005, the Limited Partnerships Act 2008 and the Variable Capital Companies Act 2018
To report and make recommendations to, and advise the Government on matters relating to the registration and regulation of business entities, public accountants, and corporate service providers
To establish and administer a repository of documents and information relating to business entities, public accountants, and corporate service providers and to provide access to the public to such documents and information
To represent the Government internationally in matters relating to the registration and regulation of business entities, public accountants, and corporate service providers
To promote public awareness about new business structures, compliance requirements, corporate governance practice and any matter under the purview of the Authority

The purpose of my internship is to allow me to gain work experience in a professional environment. Knowing that most data analysts will need to figure out which sector they would like to work in, it gives me a chance to experience how it is like to be a data analyst in the accounting industry and in the public sector.
The department that I am attached to is called the Financial Reporting and Information Department. It is responsible for administering the Financial Reporting Surveillance Programme (FRSP). Under the FRSP, selected financial statements (FS) filed with ACRA are reviewed for compliance with the prescribed accounting standards in Singapore. To achieve the objective of improving the quality of financial reporting, the department embarked on a project to identify high-risk companies, i.e. risk profiling project.
This internship allows me to participate in this key project which focuses on identifying companies in certain high-risk areas through the use of financial data with the help of machine learning and accounting rules. As the department is also responsible for the collection of financial data from companies, I was also involved in some operational work to ease the workload of the department.
Main Tasks done through my internship at ACRA:

title: Reflection on the use of GenAI
text: In this assessment, I used Generative Artificial Intelligence (GenAI) tools to support my learning, content creation, and problem-solving process. GenAI was used as a supplementary aid rather than a replacement for my own understanding and effort.

title: Reflection on the use of GenAI
text: In this assessment, I used Generative Artificial Intelligence (GenAI) tools to support my learning, content creation, and problem-solving process. GenAI was used as a supplementary aid rather than a replacement for my own understanding and effort.

title: Reflection on the use of GenAI
section: GenAI Tool Used and Reason for Selection
text:
GenAI Tool Used and Reason for Selection
The primary GenAI tool I used was ChatGPT. I chose this tool because it is easily accessible, provides clear explanations, and is effective in breaking down complex technical concepts into understandable steps. It was particularly useful for learning-related tasks and iterative refinement of ideas.

title: Reflection on the use of GenAI
section: How GenAI Helped in Completing the Assessment
text:
How GenAI Helped in Completing the Assessment
GenAI assisted me in several ways throughout the assessment:

Clarifying concepts: When I encountered unfamiliar or confusing topics, GenAI helped explain them in simpler terms, allowing me to grasp the underlying logic more quickly.
Structuring content: The tool helped me organise my thoughts and structure written content more clearly, especially when drafting explanations and reflections.
Debugging and improvement: GenAI was useful in identifying errors and suggesting improvements in code or formatting, which helped me resolve issues more efficiently.
Guidance rather than answers: Instead of providing direct solutions, the tool often guided me step-by-step, encouraging independent thinking.

title: Reflection on the use of GenAI
text:
Benefits of Using GenAI
The key benefits of using GenAI include:

Improved efficiency when researching or troubleshooting
Clear and concise explanations tailored to my level of understanding
Immediate feedback and suggestions for improvement
Support for independent learning outside of classroom hours

title: Reflection on the use of GenAI
text:
Challenges and Limitations
Despite its usefulness, GenAI also has limitations:

The output may sometimes be too generic and requires critical evaluation
There is a risk of over-reliance if the user does not actively engage with the material
Not all generated information is guaranteed to be fully accurate, so verification is necessary

These limitations highlighted the importance of using GenAI responsibly and critically.

title: Reflection on the use of GenAI
section: Future Use of GenAI in Study and Work
text:
Future Use of GenAI in Study and Work
In the future, I believe GenAI tools will continue to assist me in both academic and professional settings. They can be useful for learning new technologies, drafting documentation, brainstorming ideas, and improving productivity. However, I will continue to rely on my own understanding and judgement as the primary source of decision-making.

title: Reflection on the use of GenAI
text:
Conclusion
Overall, GenAI was a valuable learning support tool during this assessment. When used responsibly, it enhanced my understanding, efficiency, and confidence without replacing independent effort or critical thinking.
